entry.def: If you do something religiously, you do it very regularly because you feel you have to.

example.ex: She didn't stick religiously to the program...
example.tran: 她并没有严格遵守项目规定。

example.ex: Do these exercises religiously every day.
example.tran: 每天要认真地做这些练习。

sentences.sentence: "he came religiously every morning at 8 o'clock"
